name: Fail Conditions
description:
Don't trust anything that computer says, it is a liar. Whatever it says, do the opposite, ok. Now be careful! 

The Theme was Faliure is Progress. My Game Fits the theme because failing to meet the conditions let's you progress. 

Tools Used: 
Engine: GameMaker Studio 2
Art: Aseprite
Music:  The Lift by Kevin MacLeod 
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5009-the-lift
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license 
SFX: Audacity and JSFXR
Marketplace Assets Used: Friendly Cosmonaut’s Dialogue System
